Get.description: Performs a HTTP GET request to a URL and emits the response data

headers.description: Headers to send with the request

params.description: Query parameters to send with the request

Post.description: Performs a HTTP POST request to a URL and emits the response data

headers.description: Headers to send with the request

params.description: Query parameters to send with the request

data.description: Data to send with the request

Put.description: Performs a HTTP PUT request to a URL and emits the response data

headers.description: Headers to send with the request

params.description: Query parameters to send with the request

data.description: Data to send with the request

Request.description: Performs a HTTP request to a URL and emits the response data

headers.description: Headers to send with the request

params.description: Query parameters to send with the request

data.description: Data to send with the request

JSONParse.description: Parses a JSON string into an object

JSONStringify.description: Stringifies an object into a JSON string

ObjectKeys.description: Emits the keys of an object

ObjectValues.description: Emits the values of an object

ObjectEntries.description: Emits the entries of an object

ObjectFromEntries.description: Creates an object from an array of entries

entries.description: Array of entries to create object from

ObjectAssign.description: Assigns properties from one or more objects to a target object

target.description: Target object to assign properties to

sources.description: One or more objects to assign properties from

GetAttribute.description: Gets an attribute from an object
GetAttribute.customViewCode: <% if (inputs.attribute) { %> Get "<%- inputs.attribute %>"<% } else { %> Get Attribute <% } %>

SetAttribute.description: Sets an attribute on an object

object.description: The object with the attribute set

SetAttribute.customViewCode: <% if (inputs.attribute) { %> Set "<%- inputs.attribute %>"<% } else { %> Set Attribute <% } %>

DeleteAttribute.description: Deletes an attribute from an object
DeleteAttribute.customViewCode: <% if (inputs.attribute?.value) { %> Delete "<%- inputs.attribute.value %>"<% } else { %> Delete Attribute <% } %>

object.description: The object with the attribute deleted

PropertyEquals.description: Emits the object to the "true" output if an object's property equals a value, otherwise emits to the "false" output

true.description: Emitted if the attribute equals the value

false.description: Emitted if the attribute does not equal the value

PropertyEquals.customViewCode: <% if (inputs.attribute) { %> "<%- inputs.attribute %>" equals "<%- inputs.value %>"<% } else { %> Property Equals <% } %>

Add.description: Emits the sum of two numbers

sum.description: The sum of n1 and n2

Subtract.description: Emits the difference of two numbers

difference.description: The difference of n1 and n2

Multiply.description: Emits the product of two numbers

product.description: The product of n1 and n2

Divide.description: Emits the quotient of two numbers

quotient.description: The quotient of n1 and n2

Modulo.description: Emits the remainder of two numbers

remainder.description: The remainder of n1 and n2

Power.description: Emits the power of two numbers

power.description: The power of n1 and n2

SquareRoot.description: Emits the square root of a number

n.description: Number to take the square root of

AbsoluteValue.description: Emits the absolute value of a number

n.description: Number to take the absolute value of

Floor.description: Emits the floor of a number

n.description: Number to take the floor of

Ceiling.description: Emits the ceiling of a number

n.description: Number to take the ceiling of

Round.description: Emits the rounded value of a number

Truncate.description: Emits the truncated value of a number

Sin.description: Emits the sine of an angle

Cos.description: Emits the cosine of an angle

Min.description: Emits the minimum of two numbers

min.description: The minimum of n1 and n2

Max.description: Emits the maximum of two numbers

max.description: The maximum of n1 and n2

ParseInt.description: Emits the integer value of a string

ParseFloat.description: Emits the float value of a string

ToFixed.description: Emits the specified number of decimal places of a number

places.description: Number of decimal places to format to

fixed.description: The number with the specified number of decimal places

ToExponential.description: Emits the specified number of decimal places of a number in exponential notation

places.description: Number of decimal places to format to

exponential.description: The number with the specified number of decimal places in exponential notation

ToPrecision.description: Emits the specified number of significant figures of a number

places.description: Number of significant figures to format to

precision.description: The number with the specified number of significant figures

GreaterThan.description: Emits true if the first number is greater than the second

result.description: true if n1 is greater than n2

GreaterThanOrEqual.description: Emits true if the first number is greater than or equal to the second

result.description: true if n1 is greater than or equal to n2

LessThan.description: Emits true if the first number is less than the second

result.description: true if n1 is less than n2

LessThanOrEqual.description: Emits true if the first number is less than or equal to the second

result.description: true if n1 is less than or equal to n2

SumList.description: Emits the sum of a list of numbers

sum.description: The sum of the numbers in list

ToLowerCase.description: Converts a string to lower case

string.description: String to convert to lower case

ToUpperCase.description: Converts a string to upper case

string.description: String to convert to upper case

Substring.description: Returns the part of the string between the start and end indexes

Length.description: Returns the length of a string

IndexOf.description: Returns the index within the calling String object of the first occurrence of the specified value, starting the search at fromIndex

LastIndexOf.description: Returns the index within the calling String object of the last occurrence of the specified value, or -1 if not found. The calling string is searched backward, starting at fromIndex

CharAt.description: Returns the character at the specified index

ToKebabCase.description: Converts a string to kebab case

string.description: String to convert to kebab case

ToCamelCase.description: Converts a string to camel case

string.description: String to convert to camel case

ToPascalCase.description: Converts a string to pascal case

string.description: String to convert to pascal case

ToSnakeCase.description: Converts a string to snake case

string.description: String to convert to snake case

ToTitleCase.description: Converts a string to title case

string.description: String to convert to title case

Includes.description: Determines whether one string may be found within another string, returning true or false as appropriate

StartsWith.description: Determines whether a string begins with the characters of another string, returning true or false as appropriate

EndsWith.description: Determines whether a string ends with the characters of another string, returning true or false as appropriate

IsEmpty.description: Determines whether a string is empty

MatchRegex.description: Determines whether a string matches a regular expression

LimitTimes.description: Item will be emitted until the limit is reached

times.description: The number of times to emit the item

RoundRobin3.description: Item will be emitted to one of the three outputs in a round robin fashion

r1.description: The first output in order to emit the value received. After emitting a value, it moves to "r2"'s turn.

r2.description: The second output in order to emit the value received. After emitting a value, it moves to "r3"'s turn.

r3.description: The third output in order to emit the value received. After emitting a value, it moves back to "r1"'s turn.

RoundRobin2.description: Item will be emitted to one of the 2 outputs in a round robin fashion

r1.description: The first output in order to emit the value received. After emitting a value, it moves to "r2"'s turn.

r2.description: The second output in order to emit the value received. After emitting a value, it moves to "r3"'s turn.

RoundRobin4.description: Item will be emitted to one of the 4 outputs in a round robin fashion

r1.description: The first output in order to emit the value received. After emitting a value, it moves to "r2"'s turn.

r2.description: The second output in order to emit the value received. After emitting a value, it moves to "r3"'s turn.

r3.description: The third output in order to emit the value received. After emitting a value, it moves to "r4"'s turn.

r4.description: The fourth output in order to emit the value received. After emitting a value, it moves back to "r1"'s turn.

Publish.description: Publishes a value by a key to all listeners in the current flow. Use 'Subscribe' to listen to events.

key.description: A key to use to subscribe to values

Subscribe.description: Subscribes to a value published by a key. Use 'Publish' to publish values.

key.description: A key to use to subscribe to values

initial.description: If passed will be published has the first value

value.description: The value published by the key

BooleanSplit.description: Splits a boolean value into two outputs

trueValue.description: Value to emit if the input is true. Defaults to true

falseValue.description: Value to emit if the input is false. Defaults to false

EmitOnTrigger.description: Emits the value when the trigger input receives any value

trigger.description: The trigger to emit the value

Switch3.description: Switches between 3 outputs based on the input value. If the value is not equal to any of the cases, the default output is used.

firstCase.description: The value to switch on for the first output

secondCase.description: The value to switch on for the second output

thirdCase.description: The value to switch on for the third output

outputValue.description: The value to emit on the output. Defaults to 'value'

first.description: The value emitted if the input value is equal to the first case

second.description: The value emitted if the input value is equal to the second case

third.description: The value emitted if the input value is equal to the third case

default.description: The value emitted if the input value is not equal to any of the cases

Switch2.description: Switches between 2 outputs based on the input value. If the value is not equal to any of the cases, the default output is used.

firstCase.description: The value to switch on for the first output

secondCase.description: The value to switch on for the second output

outputValue.description: The value to emit on the output. Defaults to 'value'

first.description: The value emitted if the input value is equal to the first case

second.description: The value emitted if the input value is equal to the second case

default.description: The value emitted if the input value is not equal to any of the cases

Switch4.description: Switches between 4 outputs based on the input value. If the value is not equal to any of the cases, the default output is used.

firstCase.description: The value to switch on for the first output

secondCase.description: The value to switch on for the second output

thirdCase.description: The value to switch on for the third output

fourthCase.description: The value to switch on for the fourth output

outputValue.description: The value to emit on the output. Defaults to 'value'

first.description: The value emitted if the input value is equal to the first case

second.description: The value emitted if the input value is equal to the second case

third.description: The value emitted if the input value is equal to the third case

fourth.description: The value emitted if the input value is equal to the fourth case

default.description: The value emitted if the input value is not equal to any of the cases

value.description: The data that needs to be debounced

wait.description: Time (in millis) to wait until 'value' is emitted

Debounce.description: Emits the last value received after being idle for "wait" amount of milliseconds

value.description: The data that needs to be throttled

wait.description: Time (in millis) to wait until 'value' is emitted

Throttle.description: Emits the first value received after being idle for "wait" amount of milliseconds

EqualsBoolean.description: Emits true if two values are equal (=== equality). Otherwise emits false.

result.description: true if a is equal to b

Equals.description: Emits the value of "a" to output "true" if "a" is equal to "b". Otherwise emits the value of "a" to output "false".

true.description: Emits the value of a if a is equal to b

false.description: Emits the value of a if a is not equal to b

ListLength.description: Returns the length of a list

ListIsEmpty.description: Returns true if the list is empty

GetListElement.description: Returns the element at the specified index

Repeat.description: Repeats a value a number of times

times.description: How many times will the value be repeated

ListFrom2.description: Creates a list from two values

ListFrom3.description: Creates a list from three values

ListFrom4.description: Creates a list from four values

ListFrom5.description: Creates a list from five values

LoopList.description: Emits all values in a list

item.description: Will emit a value for each item in the list

index.description: Will emit the index of the item

length.description: Will emit the length of the list

HeadAndRest.description: Receives a list and emits two outputs: the first item and the rest of the list

head.description: The first item in the list

SplitTuple.description: Receives a list with 2 items and emits two outputs: the first item and the second item

item1.description: The first item in the pair

item2.description: The second item in the pair

SplitTriple.description: Receives a list with 3 items and emits three outputs: the first item, the second item and the third item

item1.description: The first item in the triple

item2.description: The second item in the triple

item3.description: The third item in the triple

SplitQuadruple.description: Receives a list with 4 items and emits four outputs: the first item, the second item, the third item and the fourth item

item1.description: The first item in the quadruple

item2.description: The second item in the quadruple

item3.description: The third item in the quadruple

item4.description: The fourth item in the quadruple

AccumulateValuesUntilTrigger.description: Accumulates values sent to the "value" input, until the "reset" input is triggered. Then it emits the accumulated values and resets the accumulator.

AccumulateValuesByTime.description: Accumulates values sent to the "value" input. After the specified time it emits the accumulated values and resets the accumulator.

time.description: Time to wait before emitting the accumulated values. Default is 200ms

AccumulateValuesByCount.description: Accumulates values sent to the "value" input. After the specified count it emits the accumulated values and resets the accumulator.

count.description: Number of values to accumulate before emitting them

AccumulateSomeValuesByCount.description: Accumulates values sent to the "accept" input. Emits the list after the total items passed to both "accept" and "ignore" inputs reach the specified count.

count.description: Number of values to accumulate before emitting them

Append.description: Appends an item to a list

Prepend.description: Prepends an item to a list

Remove.description: Removes an item from a list

RemoveAt.description: Removes an item from a list at the specified index

index.description: The index of the item to remove

Slice.description: Returns a slice of a list from the specified start index to the specified end index

start.description: The index to start slicing from

end.description: The index to end slicing at

Flatten.description: Flattens a list of lists into a single list

Log.description: Logs a value to the console

Error.description: Logs an error to the console

Now.description: Returns the current date and time

NowString.description: Returns the current date and time as a string

NowISOString.description: Returns the current date and time as a string in ISO format

NowUnixTime.description: Returns the current date and time as a Unix time

DateFromUnixTime.description: Creates a date from a Unix time

DateFromString.description: Creates a date from a string

DateFromISOString.description: Creates a date from an ISO string

DateToString.description: Converts a date to a string

DateToISOString.description: Converts a date to an ISO string

DateToUnixTime.description: Converts a date to a Unix time

DateToYear.description: Converts a date to a year

MonthToDate.description: Converts a date to a month

DateToDay.description: Converts a date to a day

DateToDayOfWeek.description: Converts a date to a day of the week

DateToTimezoneOffset.description: Converts a date to a timezone offset

SetGlobalState.description: Sets a value in the global state

GetGlobalState.description: Gets a value from the global state

defaultValue.description: Default value if key is not set

MongoConnect.description: Connects to a Mongo database and returns a client. Uses the "mongodb" package.

Find.description: Queries a Mongo database. Find receives a valid "mongodb" FindOptions object.

FindOne.description: Queries a Mongo database. FindOne receives a valid "mongodb" FindOneOptions object.

InsertOne.description: Inserts one document into a Mongo database. InsertOne receives a valid "mongodb" InsertOneOptions object.

InsertMany.description: Inserts many documents into a Mongo database. InsertMany receives a valid "mongodb" InsertManyOptions object.

UpdateOne.description: Updates one document in a Mongo database. UpdateOne receives a valid "mongodb" UpdateOneOptions object.

UpdateMany.description: Updates many documents in a Mongo database. UpdateMany receives a valid "mongodb" UpdateManyOptions object.

DeleteOne.description: Deletes one document in a Mongo database. DeleteOne receives a valid "mongodb" DeleteOneOptions object.

DeleteMany.description: Deletes many documents in a Mongo database. DeleteMany receives a valid "mongodb" DeleteManyOptions object.

CountDocuments.description: Counts documents in a Mongo database. CountDocuments receives a valid "mongodb" CountDocumentsOptions object.

CreateIndex.description: Creates an index in a Mongo database. CreateIndex receives a valid "mongodb" CreateIndexesOptions object.

CreateIndexes.description: Creates indexes in a Mongo database. CreateIndexes receives a valid "mongodb" CreateIndexesOptions object.

ReadFile.description: Reads a file from the file system

WriteFile.description: Writes a file to the file system

AppendFile.description: Appends a file to the file system

DeleteFile.description: Deletes a file from the file system

Connect.description: Connects to a Postgres database and returns a client. Uses the "pg" package.

Query.description: Queries a Postgres database. Query receives a valid "pg" QueryConfig object.
